Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 74.4 in the City of Richmond, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south center lane and right lane are closed. The south exit 74A narrows.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
